_header: I that in health was and gladness
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Lament for the Makars’ — twenty-five quatrains with refrain: ‘Timor mortis conturbat me’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
I That in heilth wes and glaidnesand trowblit now with grit
                    seiknes…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…eftir our deid þat leif may weTimor mortis conturbat
                    me

Banna.First Lines:
I that is in heill ws wes & glaidnessam
                    trublit now with grit seikness…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Eftir deth that leif may weTymor mortis conturbat
                    me
